message.name: ERR_SA_FV_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: A payment amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SA_FV_PAYMENT_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: A payment frequency must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SA_FV_ACTIVITY_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: An activity type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SA_FV_AWARD_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: An award type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SA_FV_START_DATE_NULL
message.locale: The start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SA_FV_END_DATE_NULL
message.locale: The end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SA_XFV_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than the start date.

message.name: ERR_SAMPLE_SPORTINGACTIVITY_XRV_SPORTINGACTIVITYEXPENSE_EXISTS
message.locale: A Sample Sporting Activity record cannot be removed as it has one or more related Sample Sporting Activity Expense records.

message.name: ERR_SA_XFV_START_DATE_AFTER_SAE_START_DATES
message.locale: The Sporting Activity start date must not be later than any of its related Sporting Activity Expense start dates.

message.name: ERR_SA_XFV_END_DATE_BEFORE_SAE_END_DATES
message.locale: The Sporting Activity end date must not be earlier than any of its related Sporting Activity Expense end dates.
